fields.name: The Prince's Tavern
fields.description: The king of a nearby country sends you to the notorious Prince's Tavern to find a priceless bottle of 600-year-old Scotch. But what rowdy creatures and horrors wait inside?
fields.intro_text:
As you travel across an unknown land, a troop of men proclaiming themselves as guardians of King Radaar's lands overtake and capture you.

They bring you before King Radaar and he recognizes you as a free adventurer. He says, "I have heard many great tales of free adventurers, from Bob the Wanderer to Deljem Frolic. It is said that you would rather die than fail on a mission.

"I am in need of your services. My drunken son, the prince, owns a tavern close by.

"He has a gift I must bring to a neighboring king's coronation. It is a 600 year old bottle of Scotch. I will pay you well to go into his tavern, find the scotch and bring it back to me.

If you come out without the bottle then you will have failed; and you know what to expect for failure."

Since you have no choice, you agree to bring back the bottle of Scotch.

As you set forth, (followed by several of King Radaar's ruffians) you meet an old man and ask directions to the Prince's Tavern. He realizes you to be a stranger and says, "Many strange beings inhabit the rooms of the tavern and many strange happenings are said to have transpired there." He then notices your "buddies".

The old man looks at you sadly, raises his hand above his head and says, "Evantke!"

Smoke appears all around you. When it thins, you see that you are in front of the Prince's Tavern. It is a large building that looks like it has been added onto several times. There are lights in the many, grimy windows. You smell stale beer and whiskey and hear the sounds of laughter and carousing from within. And another sound, too. You think it was the crash of a piece of furniture breaking...

You approach the tavern and ring the bell.

The door opens slowly, though no one comes to greet you.

fields.name: You are outside the entrance
fields.description: You are at the entrance to the Prince's Tavern. The big front door is open, but no one is there to greet you. King Radaar's guards stand behind you. They will not let you go in any direction but north, into the tavern.

fields.name: You are in the main entry
fields.description: You are in the main entry. As you went through the entrance, the entry door locked. To the west is a door and the main entry continues north.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a n/s hallway
fields.description: You are at the north end of the main entry way. The east wall is decorated in a mural of an old stone village imbedded in a hillside overlooking a fertile farm valley with stone and wood fences. A door lies west.

fields.name: You are in a green lighted room
fields.description: This bar is bathed in green light. There is a candle burning behind a stained glass sign advertising Dextix's Mead, out of reach on the north wall. There are exits to the east, west and south. The bartender must be on break.

fields.name: You are in the playroom
fields.description: You are in what appears to be a children's playroom. There are broken glasses, chairs and tables all over the room. The light is very dim and the room smells of alcohol. A green light falls through the east doorway. Lettering on the north doorway reads 'nursery'.

fields.name: You are in the nursery
fields.description: The carpet in the room is very worn. There are no windows or lights but you can see quite clearly. There are crayon stick figures all over the walls. A door to the south is labeled 'play room'.

fields.name: You are in the Gerschter bar
fields.description: This is a pub with wooden benches and booths, all having red cushions. Oil lamps turned low do not dim the brightly coloured clothes of all the people here. Doors are east and west, a green light emits from the north doorway.

fields.name: You are in the tack room
fields.description: Many saddles and blankets are securely hung from the walls (apparently belonging to the guests). A wood-planked door is to the south with shafts of straw stabbing out from underneath it and another door leads east.

fields.name: You are inside a barrel of wine!
fields.description: You are inside a sealed wine barrel, which is mostly full of wine. It is getting hard to breathe because the blood-red liquid is up to your mouth. Total darkness reigns and you need to do something fast before you suffocate!

fields.name: You are in the stable
fields.description: You are in the stable near the tavern entrance. The room smells terrible! The floor is covered with straw and clumps of animal dung. Horse thieves scowl at you from an open southern doorway to the corral. They point their swords at you and motion you back the way you came.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a hallway (door e).
fields.description: You are at the south end of a hallway. An iron, oil-fed torch bolted to the south wall gives some light to see the cold stone and dirt floor. A soft, dim light filters in from the north and a door is to the east.

fields.name: You are in an empty wine barrel.
fields.description: You are in an empty wine barrel. The wooden planks seem to give a little as you test their strength. The smell is of a vintage the main hall serves regularly, but weren't they suppose to ferment it themselves?

fields.name: You are in a n/s hallway.
fields.description: You are in a n/s hallway. You see a light to the south and a dim light to the north. There are no patrons here. In the distance to the north, you hear piano music.

fields.name: You are in a n/s hallway.
fields.description: You are in a n/s hallway. You see lights to the north and south. The sound of piano music comes from the north, louder now.

fields.name: You are in a n/s hallway.
fields.description: You are in a hallway running north and south. You see a light to the north and hear a discordant tune being played on a piano. To the south, the hallway is dark, but you see a light in the distance.

fields.name: You are in an empty wine barrel.
fields.description: You are in an empty wine barrel with an open hole to the north. Light peers in from the hole and you can see markings on the bottom of the wooden barrel.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a n/s hallway.
fields.description: You are at the north end of the hallway. In the distance to the south, you see a dim light. On the north wall is a torch. Light pours brightly from an arched doorway to the east.

fields.name: You are in the wine cellar.
fields.description: You are in a wine cellar with many barrels lined along the east and west dirt walls. An iron door is at the north end of the cellar with a lock on the inside (to keep people out.) an open barrel lies to the south.

fields.name: You are in a piano bar.
fields.description: You are in a well lighted piano bar. A grand piano fills the room with stools along the curved side. This place seems out of the traffic area and no patrons are here. Open archways lie east and west.

fields.name: You are in a storage room.
fields.description: You are in a storage room with rickety wooden benches stacked against the dingy northern and eastern walls. An open archway lies to the west and you hear music from behind an oak door to the south.

fields.name: You are in a medium sized room.
fields.description: The music is very loud. It is coming from behind saloon type swinging doors to the west. There is a door to the north.

fields.name: You are in the saloon.
fields.description: You are in a saloon. There is a strange mechanical device playing loudly in a corner. The only exit is through the swinging doors (the way you came in).

fields.name: You are in the lunch room.
fields.description: You have entered a large dining area with many tables and benches, making it difficult to maneuver. There are exits in all directions.

fields.name: You are in the pool room.
fields.description: You are in the southwest corner of a very large room. There is a pool table in the middle of the room where a game seems to be in progress. You may move north or east within the room, or exit south.

fields.name: You are in the pool room.
fields.description: You are in the northwest corner of a very large room. A pool table sits in the middle of the room with a game in progress. Looks like the solid team is behind. You may move south or east.

fields.name: You are on the pool table.
fields.description: You are on top of an orange felt pool table. You hear the clacking of the balls as they roll into each other.

fields.name: You are in the pool room.
fields.description: You are in the southeast corner of a very large room. There is a pool table in the middle of the room and a picture of a strange creature with two noses on the wall. You may go west or north in the room or south into the cloak room.

fields.name: You are in the cloak room.
fields.description: You are in a rectangular shaped room. There are many coat pegs protruding from the walls. Two wooden doors face you; one north and one west.

fields.name: You are in the pool room.
fields.description: You are in the northeast corner of a very large room. There is a pool table in the middle of the room and a door to the north. You can also move west or south in the room.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a n/s hallway.
fields.description: You are standing on a stone floor at the south end of a hallway. There is a wooden sliding door to the west.

fields.name: You are in the shower.
fields.description: You are in a walk-in shower. The empty bucket hangs out of reach above you and the wet floor and walls indicate it was recently used. The exit is east.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a hallway.
fields.description: You are standing on a stone floor at the north end of a hallway. There is a room to the east.

fields.name: You are in a supply room.
fields.description: You are in a room with various sized crates piled all around, some bearing labels from far off lands. Many are securely bound with metal straps. Exits are east and west.

fields.name: You are in a dark room.
fields.description: You are in a dark room. You hear bottles rolling across the floor as you kick them when you walk. They sound empty and you believe they held mead (from past experience).

fields.name: You are in the bartender training room.
fields.description: There are many bars here and there is a bar along the west wall where you may buy a drink. There is a small window to the east and doors to the north and south.

fields.name: You are at the training bar.
fields.description: You are standing in front of a bar. There are only a few barstools here, and even fewer patrons. This bar appears to be the training room for aspiring bartenders. You notice plenty of bottles on the wall, but none of them are exactly top shelf.

fields.name: You are in a small room.
fields.description: You are in a small carpeted room with a yellow light suspended from the ceiling. Doors are to the north, south, and west.

fields.name: You are in the bathroom.
fields.description: There is a wash basin and a trough built into the wall with a drainage hole in the back. The only exit is a door leading east.

fields.name: You are in the kitchen.
fields.description: You are in a grimy kitchen. The remains of various unusual food items are scattered around on grungy tables. Dirty glasses and pitchers are stacked around a tub of dirty water in the corner. There are doors to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in a large triangular room.
fields.description: You are in a large triangular shaped room. There is a three sided table in the middle of the room. You may go east and south within the room or exit to the north.

fields.name: You are in a triangular shaped room.
fields.description: You are in the southwest corner of a triangular shaped room. There is a door to the west. You may move north and east within the room.

fields.name: You are in a triangular shaped room.
fields.description: You are in the southeast corner of a large triangular shaped room. You see your reflection in an iron-framed, full length mirror mounted on the east wall. You may move north and west in the room.

fields.name: You are in a large triangular shaped room.
fields.description: You are in the northeast corner of a triangular shaped room. There is a metal door to the north. You may move west and south in the room. There is a window in the east wall.

fields.name: You are in the freezer.
fields.description: It is very cold in here. There is much frozen food on the shelves along the walls. It all seems to be frozen in one massive block of ice. (apparently no one has defrosted the ice box lately.) the only exit is south.

fields.name: You are in an odd shaped room.
fields.description: You are in an odd shaped paneled room with swizzle sticks on the floor. You hear voices from behind the curtains to the west. There is a door to the east.

fields.name: You are in the poker room.
fields.description: Some men playing poker greet you as you enter a smoked filled room. They quickly resume playing with much concentration. There are doorways north and east.

fields.name: You are in a very dark hallway.
fields.description: You are in a very dark hallway. It's too dark to see anything, but the hallway seems to go west and south.

fields.name: You are in a very dark secret passage.
fields.description: The mirror was an illusion! You pass through into a dark, narrow secret passage. It's too dark to see much, but you feel around and find a passage leading north. You can also go back through the mirror by going west.

fields.name: You are in a very dark e/w hallway.
fields.description: You are in a very dark secret hallway running from east to west. You see a faint light from a room to the west. To the east, the hallway disappears into utter darkness.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of dirt staircase.
fields.description: You are at the bottom of dirt steps leading into a musty darkness. The cellar door is to the south and stone walls to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in the distillery.
fields.description: In the dim light you see many vats, copper tubing and wooden kegs. This place is alive with hissing sounds, boiling concoctions and dripping brews. This must be the distillery. Dark exits are outlined east and west.

fields.name: You are in a very dark place.
fields.description: You are in a dark room with a faint red light glowing in from the western doorway. Bubbling sounds can be heard from the east.

fields.name: You are at the top of a dirt staircase.
fields.description: You see a square hole cut in the wooden planks above you within arms reach. You can hear a voice - '...ah! here ye be! go and have fun in the main hall.' the stairs lead down into darkness. No other exists can be seen.

fields.name: You are in a magical room.
fields.description: You have stepped into a magical room! Yellow light emits from the ceiling and red from the floor. The air is clean, not musty, and energy seems to flow through your mind cells with vigor. The only opening is south.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.
fields.description: You are at the intersection of two corridors. The area is lit by a small glowing oil lamp with a red shade, placed out of reach. Corridors continue west, east and south.

fields.name: You are in a backroom.
fields.description: You are in a small back room used for an office. A wooden desk with hand-carved designs of animal heads along the corners sits in the middle of the room. The only exit lies to the east.

fields.name: You are outside the tavern.
fields.description: You are outside the backroom at the tavern. The road north leads to the main hall. The door to the south is locked.

fields.name: You are in a n/s corridor.
fields.description: You are in a dark north-south corridor. It is quiet here, and there are no footprints in the dust on the floor.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a corridor.
fields.description: You are at the south end of a n/s corridor. There is a vault door to the south. The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in the vault.
fields.description: You are at the east end of the vault. There is a door to the north. The vault extends to the west. The southern wall seems to shimmer without taking solid form!

fields.name: You are at the bottom of dirt staircase.
fields.description: (UNUSED ROOM - SEE #50) You are at the bottom of dirt steps leading into a musty darkness. Red and yellow light glow from an opening from the west. The cellar door is to the south and a wall east.

fields.name: You are at the west end of the vault.
fields.description: You are at the west end of the vault. You can only go east.

fields.name: You are in the middle of the main entry way.
fields.description: You are in the middle of the main entry way running north and south. There are solid oak doors to the east and west with brass handles. A sign on the west door reads "Gerschter Bar."

fields.name: matchbook
fields.description: You see a matchbook with an alchemy correspondence course on the cover. It has one match remaining.

fields.name: feather pen
fields.description: You see a feather pen made from a rare oreigan (now extinct). A blue and orange colour, these birds were once thought to be the pets of the gods. A feather from one of them was supposed to be good luck.

fields.name: mirror
fields.description: As you reach out to touch the smooth surface of the glass, your hand glides through the mirror - feeling nothing! The reflection is rippling from where your hand is no longer visible. Retracting your hand smoothes the reflection.

fields.name: torch
fields.description: You see a lighted torch

fields.name: broken bottle
fields.description: You see a brown broken bottle

fields.name: brown bottle
fields.description: You see an empty brown bottle

fields.name: pool balls
fields.description: You see several round, wooden pool balls with dents and gouges in them. The paint is cracked and chipping and only faint numbers can be read, if any.

fields.name: lamp
fields.description: You see a shiny copper, hand-held lamp. It is out of fluid and the wick has been burnt to nothing. The initials "RJEH" are engraved on it.

fields.name: right sock
fields.description: You see a blue right sock.

fields.name: magic blue sphere
fields.description: You see a magic sphere that glows with an unearthly blue light. Controlled by your thoughts, it moves with speed and precision. This heavy object could make a formidable weapon, or battering ram!

fields.name: coats
fields.description: You see five coats of various sizes, shapes and conditions.

fields.name: ivory pool ball
fields.description: You see a round, solid ivory pool ball. It is of excellent workmanship and seems to be recently made. This should be worth something back at the main hall.

fields.name: silver amulet
fields.description: You see a magical silver amulet with a ruby on either side of a violet amethyst. The initials "H.T." are scratched on the back. A small flame seems to be embedded in the amethyst, but it does not glow.

fields.name: cook book
fields.description: You see a thick, leather bound book with the title '12 ways to disquise meatloaf'

fields.name: candle
fields.description: You see a small yellow candle with the words 'use only in dire need' on it.

fields.name: lead pipe
fields.description: You see a lead pipe that was used as a weapon by the construction worker.

fields.name: peanuts
fields.description: You see a bunch of shelled peanuts (not roasted).

fields.name: strange brew
fields.description: You see a jar of experimental brew. The yellow-brown liquid is still gurgling slowly and popping at irregular intervals. It looks as if it may be highly unstable.

fields.name: case of brandy
fields.description: You see a case of brandy.

fields.name: case of rum
fields.description: You see a case of rum.

fields.name: case of vodka
fields.description: You see a case of vodka.

fields.name: crystal slipper
fields.description: You see a crystal slipper with a Dr. Scholl's foot pad in it.

fields.name: sign
fields.description: You see a sign reading 'NO FIGHTING, NO MAGIC' affixed permanently to the wall.

fields.name: treasure chest
fields.description: You see a small brown treasure chest with emeralds and amethysts in it.

fields.name: 600 year old scotch
fields.description: You see a very dusty 600 year old bottle of scotch.

fields.name: empty bottle
fields.description: You see an empty 600 year old bottle.

fields.name: shot glasses
fields.description: You see a wooden box containing platinum shot glasses. There are six in the box and a note is attached to the box lid reading 'to my son on his grand opening' signed king radaar.

fields.name: gold key
fields.description: You see a dull gold key.

fields.name: pool cue
fields.description: You see a pool cue.

fields.name: Firebox
fields.description: You see a jeweled ivory handled sword with the name "Firebox" engraved on it.

fields.name: stack of gold
fields.description: You see a stack of gold pieces with the bust of the prince on them.

fields.name: sack of gold
fields.description: You see your sack of gold.

fields.name: unconscious woman
fields.description: You see a woman lying here unconscious.

fields.name: axe of evil
fields.description: You see the axe wielded by evil. It is made of a strange unknown metal that is warm to the touch. A sense of power seems to surround it.

fields.name: loose boards
fields.description: You see several boards of the barrel which are loose enough they may be pried from the barrel frame.

fields.name: front door
fields.description: You see a big, heavy door in the south wall leading out of the tavern. A gold plate with a keyhole is mounted on it. The door looks like it was built to keep something out. Or to keep something in?

fields.name: smoking Evil
fields.description: You see Evil wither into his black clothing and begin to smoke as he screams 'aaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh...'.

fields.name: poor dead timmy
fields.description: You see a dead small boy.

fields.name: really smelly dead goat
fields.description: You see the goat fall in defeat.

fields.name: Spot. Dead spot. Dead spot dead.
fields.description: You see spot whimper in pain and give his last living breath on this world.

fields.name: dead stray cat
fields.description: You see a dead cat.

fields.name: dead piano player
fields.description: You see the piano player utter with his last breath, 'grunt'.

fields.name: dead drunk
fields.description: You see the drunk stumble to the floor never to get up again.

fields.name: large dead ogre
fields.description: The ogre hits the floor with a tremendous thud and does not move.

fields.name: dead pool shark
fields.description: You see blood pour forth from the lady pool shark's fatal wounds. Her now non-caring eyes stare at the ceiling.

fields.name: dead Harvey
fields.description: You see a dead white rabbit.

fields.name: dead pink elephant
fields.description: You see a very large, very dead pink elephant.

fields.name: dead prince
fields.description: You see the prince go down in dignity and courage.

fields.name: dead bouncer
fields.description: You see the dead bouncer.

fields.name: dead bartender
fields.description: The bartender has mixed his last drink.

fields.name: the remains of the sad-looking thief.
fields.description: You see the thief fall and stare at the ceiling with a sad look; a look that seems to say he never had any reason to feel proud.

fields.name: dead stray dog
fields.description: You see dead stray dog

fields.name: dead fire-worm
fields.description: You see the fire-worm fall to the ground and squirm briefly, then lay still.

fields.name: dead diners
fields.description: You see diners scattered about in a bloody disarray; food and drink strewn over the floor, walls and bodies. What a mess!

fields.name: Hugo's body
fields.description: You see Hugo slump to the floor.

fields.name: Boris' body
fields.description: Boris slides down the wall and falls onto the floor.

fields.name: Ralph's body
fields.description: Ralph throws up on the table and falls face down to the floor.

fields.name: Manley's body
fields.description: Manley slumps into an awkward position on the dirty floor.

fields.name: the body of Billy Boy
fields.description: You see Billy Boy fall face down into the spittoon.

fields.name: the body of Squirrel
fields.description: Squirrel does his flying squirrel impersonation. He glides from a table top and lands flat on his belly on the floor. He does not move.

fields.name: dead barfighters
fields.description: You see the dead body of barfighters

fields.name: dead belligerent Luther
fields.description: Luther falls to his knees, spits pieces of bark at you with his last breath and collapses.

fields.name: dead Captain Tucker
fields.description: You see the dead body of Captain Tucker.

fields.name: dead sailor
fields.description: You see the dead sailor.

fields.name: dead old sailor
fields.description: You see the dead body of the old sailor.

fields.name: dead poker players
fields.description: You see the dead body of poker players

fields.name: dead Wilbur
fields.description: You see the dead body of wilbur

fields.name: The blue and grey gown of Hokas Tokas
fields.description: The mighty wizard's eyes go vacant. He falls to his knees and pitches forward. His mortal body vanishes in a puff of orange smoke.

fields.name: vault door
fields.description: You see a large, heavy iron vault door in the south wall. Etchings into the door read "Zena Vault Company, Triconton, No. 276533-d2." The combination lock is one which you recognize, a ZVC.

fields.name: graffiti
fields.description: There is graffiti carved into the wooden walls. Some of it in a foreign language. At least some of it is legible.

fields.name: air shield
fields.description: Feeling around in the air, you find an invisible shield made of hardened air. It is feather-light, yet seems very durable. It has a protrusion which serves as a handle. You quickly wrap some cloth around the handle to make it easier to see, though the rest of the shield remains invisible.

fields.name: sealed door
fields.description: A door without handle or hinge faces you from the north. There doesn't seem to be any physical way to open it.

fields.text: You see six men sitting around a large table having a drinking contest. As you enter they get up and invite you (rather strongly) to join them. They won't let you leave until you do. The largest tells you to order a drink.
As you eat the peanuts, you notice they are very salty and tend to make you very thirsty. You must have a drink. As if possessed, you wander about until you find yourself in front of a bar.
Your muscles seem to strain against you. You cannot move! As you slowly regain control of your body, the men tell you the room has had a spell of protection cast upon it.
The men grab your weapon and take it away from you, then chant together 'now drink!'.

The thieves overwelm you after several minutes of intense fighting. They get you on the ground and with gleaming sword points repeatedly bite your flesh with needle-like jabs. Pain swells from your stomach, legs and arms.
The horse thieves leave you in the stench of the corral, blood flowing from many wounds. You are too weak to move. The pain slowly gives way to the dark blanket of death beginning to enshroud you ...
Ice rains down from the ceiling! You try to get to the nearest exit, but the cold rocks knock you to the floor; pounding down upon you until you lay covered in a blanket of ice chunks.

Just as you despair of freezing to death, you call upon your magic powers again. Something seems to coalesce out of thin air, an invisible shield that forms above you, deflecting the ice until the storm subsides.
Several quick-acting men whisk you out of the establishment, dump you on a hard floor (bruising your knee) and advise you to be a little more courteous next time you're out in public.

An enchanter sitting in the marble balcony forces your spell inward, changing its weavings to a sinister form. The energy to turn it away drains you mentally. The enchanter resumes his authoritarian gaze over the festivities.

You've walked into the middle of a tremendous brawl! People are going beserk, hitting anyone near them with anything near them. Either they've run out of mead or there was something in it. Only a miracle could stop this nonsense.

Your Power spell causes a display of fireworks to go off in the room! It wasn't a miracle, but it was close enough to get the barfighters' attention!

They discontinue their misguided activity. Looking about, slightly bewildered, they realize you brought them back to reality from the altered mead they consumed. You are handed a reward as they head for home.

Hokas is so overcome with joy that he places his hand upon your forehead and says, "The power of seeking will be with you as long I am near enough to amplify your mind. Say 'Locate' followed by the object of your desires."
Hokas then puts the amulet on a golden thread around his neck and scurries off muttering about an unfinished task. You feel a warm tingly sensation along your scalp.

A wind swirls around you in tight circles, kicking up bits of debris that stings your exposed flesh. You squint your eyes to protect them. Suddenly, the wind quits and find yourself in dark wetness! A familiar smell abounds.

So 'e sais roight, lemme 'ave 'er!... Another for my illegitimate son! Do you have a silver pie... What! Again! No, no, no - let me show... in heaven's name... I am expecting all the time you do this, why, why great! Accept my lucy...

10 coppers? outra... so then I sneaks up on 'im an' whack! Evantke! Let that be a lessen... Stop. Don't. Stop. Don't stop. Don't stop! The charm of cruxis has not been broken... I definitely felt a presence... Into the night...
You just realize you've heard every conversation happening in the tavern at once! What a mind-searing sensation. The ringing slowly dissipates from your ears until... silence. (sigh)
Talk about someone who can hold their liquor, you just drank a barrel of wine! You had better find a bathroom. Or a bed. Or some cheese.

The lighting dims... a musical melody flows like a thin scent of honey. You feel your sense of proportion go awry, then realign; you realize your strength has increased and you feel as if no one can beat you in battle.

Fire springs up from all around! Heat blasts away at your flesh. Your belongings blister your hands. The lashing flames lower and then cease; your clothes smolder while carbon and ash hang on to your face and hair.
The ugly features of your body melt to a smoothness and beauty rarely seen in these parts. Your innerself seems to glow outward and you feel a need to help the needy.

A fog arises quickly, a metallic blue steed rides out of a midnight chill to stop before you! Snorting and pawing, he is angered at this summons by a mere human with little magical abilities! His eyes burn into your soul...
Ice rains down from the ceiling! You try to get to the nearest exit, but the cold rocks knock you to the floor; pounding down upon you until you lay covered in a blanket of ice chunks.

You suddenly realize you've been staring at your hands for quite some time now. The summoned horse gone, certain areas of memory have failed... those piercing eyes... you can't remember the finer points of weaponry any longer.
The door dilates soundlessly into the recesses of the wall. A red and yellow glow eases out of the opening and a tingling sensation creeps along your being.

Your senses seem to dull and standing becomes difficult without taking several steps. With blurred vision, you see a large, pink object move into the room. You shake your head rapidly and try to focus your eyes.

You feel queasy. Your head is spinning and your eyes begin to ache. That stuff tasted like tar after a dust storm! You feel prickly sensations and hair starts growing in thick thatches all over your body!
The ugly features of your body melt to a smoothness and beauty rarely seen in these parts. Your innerself seems to glow outward and you feel a need to help the needy.

Your skin suddenly gets cold! You find movement increasingly becomes difficult until you fall on the floor. After several convulsions, you can slowly get up but your agility does not seem to be too good.

The bubbles tickle your nose and the smooth, thick liquid easily slides down your throat like sweetened goat's milk. You find your mind working at an abnormally fast pace and think of several improvements to your fighting stance.

As the liquid cascades past your lips, you close your eyes and enjoy the sweet, fruity taste. After several moments, your stomach gives you fits (you knew the liquid was unstable). However, your armor doesn't seem to weigh you down like it used to.
Etchings into the vault door read "Zena Vault Company, Triconton, No. 276533-d2." The combination lock is one which you recognize, a ZVC.

You loosen enough boards to make a small opening in the barrel. The boards you get are wet with wine and stain your hands a light blood-red. Someone may think you have been battling if they see those stains.

The air in the barrel is used. You slip beneath the wine. It fills your lungs, the sting of alcohol barely noticeable as you become unconscious. You die the way you always talked about while sitting with the boys at the main hall.

As you reach out to touch the smooth surface of the glass, your hand glides through the mirror - feeling nothing! The reflection is rippling from where your hand is no longer visible. Retracting your hand smoothes the reflection.
The piano player mutters, 'My life hangs by a thread; the hands of time glitter like knives ... Drinking, drinking by the case - yes! it's an elephant ...'.
The prince smiles and says, 'I have been looking for this for 3 weeks! To thank you for your kindness, here is a key to the tavern so that you may come and go as you please.'

King Radaar scowls at you and says, 'You are not fit to be called an adventurer. Shame upon you and your guild. Find me that bottle of Scotch!' His guards point their swords at you. You turn around and go back into the tavern.

King Radaar sees the empty bottle of Scotch and scowls. "You are not fit to be called an adventurer. Shame upon you and your guild. Already you know of your fate!" He stalks off down the path and yells behind, "Finish him!"

The guards close upon you quickly seeming to all thrust their swords at once. Every muscle locks and pain swells through your body as each steel tendril is forced through and then pulled free. They leave your limp form lifeless.

King Radaar takes the bottle of scotch from you, slaps you on the shoulder and says, 'Well done! You deserve a great reward for this service you have performed for me.' With that, he hands you 2,500 gold pieces.

You later go to the coronation (at the king's request) and partake of spirits, roasted boar and song before taking to the road back to the Main Hall. Still feeling merry, you see the hall just down the hill.
The mad piano player gets a far away look in his eyes and says, 'I want to waste my substance in whiskey sours and chocolate eclairs.' He then returns to reality and begins mumbling again.
The knowledge frightens you and you never want to eat meatloaf again!

fields.name: Evil
fields.description: You see evil. This is bad. It is wearing black robes, carrying a vicious-looking axe, and emits a foul odor whenever it speaks. It looked like it moved!

fields.name: Timmy
fields.description: You see a small boy.

fields.name: smelly goat
fields.description: You see a muscular, bearded being with two horns on its head. It peers at you with close-set eyes from the darkness of one of the stalls.

fields.name: Spot
fields.description: You see a small, furry dog with a black nose.

fields.name: stray cat
fields.description: You see a large brown and yellow cat.

fields.name: mad piano player
fields.description: You see a man with wild hair and bloodshot eyes. He is sitting at a piano mumbling something about "gronking." The initials "RJEH" are carved in the piano.

fields.name: drunk
fields.description: You see a man with disarrayed clothes and smelling of alcohol.

fields.name: mean ogre
fields.description: You see a large ogre with a hungry look in its eyes.

fields.name: pool shark
fields.description: You see a lady with a pink blouse and blue jeans on. She is carrying a pool cue.

fields.name: Harvey
fields.description: You see a six-foot-tall white rabbit.

fields.name: pink elephant
fields.description: You see a rather large pink pachyderm.

fields.name: the prince
fields.description: You see a small man wearing a velvet cape and red felt clothes. He is guzzling beer after beer.

fields.name: bouncer
fields.description: Standing by the bar entrance is a very large man in a gold T-shirt. He doesn't carry a weapon, but his biceps and fists look like they could take down the most surly drunk.

fields.name: bartender
fields.description: You see a young woman standing behind the bar. She is wearing an apron with the words "Duffer's Bartender School" stitched on the front.

fields.name: thief
fields.description: You see a man going through a coat - a thief! He has an unkempt appearance and walks with a limp. Standing a full head shorter than you, he looks rather puny and probably hasn't eaten well for a long time.

fields.name: stray dog
fields.description: You see a brown dog foaming at the mouth.

fields.name: giant fire-worm
fields.description:
A movement from one of the vats catches your eye. A slime-covered creature is emerging from one of the experimental fluids. It is a fire-worm nearly 15 feet in length!

It has mutated in the chemical mixture enlarging its form. The deadly secretions from its jaws have an effect of acid. The proportional range of its strike should be 10-12 feet!

fields.name: diner
fields.description: You see a bunch of people who look more interested in eating than in looking at you.

fields.name: Hugo
fields.description: Hugo, the biggest of the men is here. He is carrying a bottle of tequila. He has a large sharp sword at his side.

fields.name: Boris
fields.description: There is another large man here. He is carrying a bottle of vodka and holding a very wicked looking mace.

fields.name: Ralph
fields.description: There is a mean looking sewer worker here. He is drinking beer and whiskey. He has a wicked looking lead pipe in his belt.

fields.name: Manley
fields.description: You see a very macho type construction worker. He is drinking rum through a straw. He has a large ball-peen hammer in one hand.

fields.name: Billy Boy
fields.description: You see a young man of about 20 with a naive innocent country boy look. But you know he is tougher than he looks.

fields.name: Squirrel
fields.description: There is a squirrelly looking young man here drinking beer on the rocks!

fields.name: barfighters
fields.description: You see many drunken and brawling men and women, madly smashing furniture over each other and spitting obscenities. Quite a nasty lot. You hear several fighters yell 'great drunk!' and others return 'costs less!'.

fields.name: Luther
fields.description: You see a man with a blue chain shirt and a yellow helmet. He's a road builder for the kingdom and he is feeling rather beligerent. He states his name to be Luther and boasts of eating a tree.

fields.name: Captain Tucker
fields.description: You see a man in a captains uniform with a strange looking parrot on his shoulder his uniform has a name tag that says 'captain tucker'.

fields.name: sailor
fields.description: You see a man in a sailor's uniform with a nasty scowl on his face and a gleam in his eye.

fields.name: old sailor
fields.description: You see an old man in a sailor uniform and a patch over one eye. He was eating peanuts and drinking beer when you came in.

fields.name: poker players
fields.description: You see a group of men who are either very close friends or the first group of siamese quintuplets you've ever seen.

fields.name: Wilbur
fields.description: You see a young man who claims he is the apprentice of Medlar of Hibernia, who still keeps a watchful eye on him.

fields.name: Hokas Tokas
fields.description: You see a very depressed, gray-haired wizard... Wait, it looks like Hokas Tokas, the wizard from the Main Hall! He tells you he has lost an amulet of great importance and cannot remember where he put it. He sips a Double Dragon Blomb.

fields.question: How do I stop the brawl?
How do I get out of the tavern?
How do I open the sealed door near the lab?
I got in a drinking contest and passed out. Why can't I hold my liquor?

fields.answer: Maybe if you distract them somehow. Something you learned in the main hall might help.
The Prince has the key. But he's a bit distracted because he's looking for something he lost. And he has bad feet.
In addition to finding the Prince, you'll need to find the bottle of scotch, or the King will be most displeased.
Find something for a certain wizard, and he'll teach you some powerful magic that will help you locate things.
No *physical* means can open the door. But that old mage who teleported you here said something that might be useful.

The amount you can drink depends on your hardiness and agility. Plus, certain drinks are stronger than others. You can always drink slower, too, but it's usually frowned upon in establishments such as this.
Look at any mirrors you find. And maybe check out the bathroom wall.
There's a name on the wall that looks like it would be a vault combination, but it's a red herring. One of the other names looks suspiciously like the name of the company that made the vault...

There are also a couple other ways out that don't involve the front door. The laws of magic are highly warped in a place as strange as the tavern. Your POWER spell may do things that are most unexpected.

Get the numbers on the bathroom wall. Ignore the one marked "V.Ault" and use the one marked "Jamie Zena." Go to the southeast corner of the tavern. Look at the mirror to find a secret passage. Follow the tunnel until you find the vault door. Type in the combination with dashes, like 12-34-56. (The exact combination is random and will vary each time you play.)
The official way is to find the slipper and give it to the Prince. He'll give you the key to the front door. But King Raadar's guards will kill you if you leave without the Scotch.
You'll find you're not the only person from the Main Hall to find themselves in the tavern. Look out for a familiar face. He can help you with your quest, if you bring him something he lost.
Magic is weird here. You might find yourself in situations where you can't cast spells, or where spells do unexpected things. Try the POWER spell here, if you dare...

The original Apple II version of this adventure had a number of sudden death traps. A few of them have been removed or altered in this version. Despite what the previous hint says, it's generally safe to cast POWER. Most of the time.
There are several endings to this adventure. A couple of them are quite hard to get to, and you'll need some magic spells to see them all.
There are a few unique magic items hidden in the tavern, but you'll need some magic, and luck, to find them all.
Drinking enough of certain beverages can make a powerful ally appear. (Try drinking beverages that aren't sold to you by a bartender.)
